reviewText: very well done,challenging , clearly explained , very useful to improve your playing .

Playing Blues of the masters...Mary is a wonderful stylist and a great guitarist with a voice as clear as a bell. Easy to understand and very thorough in the delivery. Buy this and settle in for a great lesson in Blues technique.
Good stuff. Mary Flower is great and she teaches well. If you want to learn and know this style you can't do any better than this DVD. Go for it. Believe me I've been learning for 40 years.
